name: Prologue
desc: An idle waif with no prospects to speak of...

name: A tattered scroll
desc: You buy a strange scroll from a travelling peddlar. If you could only decipher the ancient runes.

name: Apprenticeship
title: apprentice
desc: After paying a small fee, you became apprenticed to a local wizard.

name: Moving In
desc: After taking your savings, your new master grants you a small book under the stairs.

name: Book of Spells
desc: Under your master's supervision, you manage to compile your very own book of spells.

name: Pest Control
desc: After your daily castigation, your master mentions the rats in the basement have become a problem. Something about stolen shortswords and building barricades. You had better go down and deal with it.

name: Master Slain
desc: Your master was a fool. A quick murder in the dark put an end to their petty demands, and freed you to pursue your own grander designs.

name: Pests Cleared
desc: With the basement cleared, your master will have more room to stash all the gold you've been earning.

name: Profressional Magick
desc: At last you are fit to style yourself a true practitioner of magic.

name: wicked
desc: You have taken your first step on the path of evil. It's a good thing.
